review: I threw my Roku in the trash and ordered a firestick. The firestick worked perfectly from the moment I plugged it in.
author: Dustin A Nash

review: When it works it does fine, however, it seems to get hot and it stops working.  I have to unplug it from the power source, let it sit for a minute or two then reboot it.
author: Tracy-Student

review: It's really a great tool for the cable cutters out there. I had a 7 year old Netgear router that worked fine but it made the picture pretty unwatchable so once I upgraded to a Netgear N600 I dedicated the 5G band to the FireTV stick and it looks awesome. ESPN and AMC are so much more clear and crisp than I ever had with Comcast.
author: Scott Miller

review: Easy to install and operate.  Since the stick is placed behind the television, it results in a clean look.
